law.catch_line: Authority to submit plans and reports to federal Department of the Interior.
law.text: The Energy and Environment Cabinet shall have the authority to prepare and submit to the Secretary, United States Department of the Interior, reclamation plans, annual projects, applications for federal support, and any other reports or plans which are provided for or required pursuant to Title IV of the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act of 1977 (P.L. 95-87).
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1892, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 62, sec. 21.

metadata.lrc-note: The provisions of this section became operative on May 18, 1982, when the conditional approval granted by the United States Secretary of the Interior appeared in the Federal Register.
